channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m betting on another 22 spins around the sun’: I’m 65 and have $3.9 million. How much should I realistically spend on a house?
item.description: “I have zero debt, no upcoming tax liabilities and no inheritance on the horizon.”

item.title: 2024 Has Been a Year of Extremes in the Stock Market. Can it Last?
item.description: As extended as some trends have become this year, investors shouldn’t assume that they are about to revert to the mean.

item.title: Sterling Could Fall if BOE Maintains Rate-Cut Guidance
item.description: Sterling could fall further as the Bank of England is unlikely to scale back signals for interest-rate cuts next year after Wednesday’s U.K. inflation...

item.title: ‘She has two financially stable children’: Does it make sense for my wealthy mother, a recent widow, to take out a $100,000 life-insurance policy?
item.description: “It was generous of our mom to offer.”

item.title: Which of these mansions will Selena Gomez and Benny Blanco live in now that they’re engaged?
item.description: Now that they’ve “put a ring on it,” the couple have few opulent options to settle down, including Tom Petty’s former estate.

item.title: The No. 1 New Year’s resolution isn’t losing weight or exercising — it’s this financial goal, surveys say
item.description: Wealth is topping health among many people’s 2025 goals. Here’s how to stick to your financial resolutions.

item.title: I want a retirement-income solution with a 100% chance of success
item.description: New retirement research suggests a drawdown strategy that can get pretty close, but it’s not close enough for me

item.title: The Firm That Wants to Power AI With Southern Yellow Pine
item.description: A U.K. electricity generator is winnowing U.S. sites for wood-burning power plants that pump their emissions underground.

item.title: Short-Term Loans Get Just What They Need: A Long-Term Commitment
item.description: Buy now, pay later lending is attracting deep-pocketed lenders. It could be a win-win.

item.title: Stock Futures Edge Higher Ahead of Fed Decision
item.description: Stock futures edged higher ahead of the Fed’s announcement at 2 p.m., after the Dow Jones Industrial Average logged its longest losing streak in almos...
